column2: select TOP # albums.AlbumName, count (albums.AlbumName) as NumSongs, sum (albums.TrackPrice) as AlbumPrice FROM (SELECT a.Title as AlbumName, t.UnitPrice as TrackPrice FROM chinook.Track AS t INNER JOIN chinook.Album as a ON t.AlbumId = a.AlbumId) albums GROUP BY albums.AlbumName ORDER BY AlbumPrice DESC
